_LandingPage.There is 1926 Arkham Massachusetts: It is 1926. Arkham, Massachusetts. Gates to unimaginable nightmare dimensions are opening all over the city. From their depths come hideous creatures that begin haunting the night. Worse yet, if too many gates open, an entity of unfathomable power will be unleashed upon the world.
_LandingPage.Investigators stand against monster: A group of Investigators stands against these terrifying monsters, determined to fend off the dark forces of the universe. To have any chance of success, they must delve into the secrets of the Mythos and utilize all their skills, spells, and weapons.
_LandingPage.Ask your friends for game session token: Ask your friends for a game session token and join the game
_LandingPage.Track your characters in an intuitive an: Track your characters in an intuitive and interactive way! The app allows you to manage their attributes, stats, and game phase changes – all synchronized in real-time with other players in the session. Viewing character details and stats has never been easier!
_LandingPage.Keep full control over your character's: Keep full control over your character's resources! Easily add and edit money, clues, and inventory cards. Practicality and intuitiveness in one place!
_LandingPage.See what’s happening with your friends’: See what’s happening with your friends’ characters! The app lets you view the details and stats of other players, including their money, clues, and character attributes – perfect for teamwork or a little friendly competition!
_LandingPage.Revisit your epic adventures! Browse the: Revisit your epic adventures! Browse the history of past sessions, their game phases, character details, and stats – with the option to rejoin (for logged-in players). Your story is always at your fingertips!
_LandingPage.Track your progress like a pro! The app: Track your progress like a pro! The app provides detailed insights into your account stats: money earned and spent, clues, cards, stamina, or sanity gained and lost. Check how many sessions you’ve played and which characters you’ve led!
_LandingPage.Each feature ensures seamless integratio: Each feature ensures seamless integration with gameplay, an intuitive interface, and support for advanced users. Become the master of your RPG sessions!
